full_text: “The consequences of the Ukraine war will turn Russia into a ‘reduced energy power’,” writes Daniel Yergin in a guest essay for The Economist. “This marks the end of an era” that began with the collapse of the Soviet Union https://t.co/onxSJ3TDVo
